data.message: Eminems old lyrics were not better, he did have great and insane multi-syllable rhymes back in his earlier albums, his new stuff still has some of that but it's now more poetic and lyrical, metaphors/punch lines and entendres, his music is so great because it has so much replay value, you might know his newer stuff by heart word for word and you will catch new clever meanings to his lyrics the more you listen
